entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
